document.full_text: shaquille o'neal, one of the most successful and recognizable players in professional basketball, announced his retirement on wednesday, ending a career that spanned almost two decades and helped increase the popularity of the sport outside the united states.
document.title: basketball world pays homage after "shaq" quits
lines_and_colors: shaquille o'neal, one of the most successful and recognizable players in professional basketball, announced his retirement on wednesday, ending a career that spanned almost two decades and helped increase the popularity of the sport outside the united states.
